website_summaries.verdict: Add a stunning new piece to your wrist with this two-toned Marc Jacobs watch featuring crystal markers and a polished, rose-gold-plated stainless steel bracelet with a spring-lock closure.
pros: An elegant, classy, and clean looking watch
Easy to have links removed if it's too big for small wrists
Perfect for wearing with both gold and silver jewelry
cons: Some have said the watch was smaller than expected

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this watch...even the pictures doesn't do this watch any justice. It's beautiful in person. Rose Gold and silver. It's very shiny and clean! Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Thiswatch looks very elegant
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks very elegant. I highly recommend it. The rose gold detail is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: R88

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful watch. Is not so big to look bad in a tiny wrist and not so small to pass imperceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Higher

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking watch at a great price! But came with some scratches when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K.

customer_reviews.title: Chic
customer_reviews.text: Lovi it .. It looks very chic...and quantity wise excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch I purchased it on a great deal and I'm so glad I did. Looks great on.
customer_reviews.author: Cris P.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, will be returning ASAP
customer_reviews.text: Item was way smaller than what I expected. Very disappointed, will be returning ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: kaye

customer_reviews.title: If you like MK, you will love this Marc Jacobs!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the price! Wife loved it. If you like MKors watches, this one has the style, the glamour and the price of a MK but its a MARC JACOBS!!
customer_reviews.author: jainuelljtg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it. It is a piece of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Not to big not to small and great to wear with silver or gold. Also easy to make smaller if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Brokmeier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch. Its beautiful, great fit. its exactly as its shown.
customer_reviews.author: josslena

customer_reviews.title: just the watch I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! However the watch box it came in was kind of dirty made me feel unsure if it was the original box.. or if they just picked a random watch box to put the watch in! But the watch was wrapped up inside and ok!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Serda

customer_reviews.title: it looks much better than the shown picture
customer_reviews.text: In reality, it looks much better than the shown picture.
customer_reviews.author: Hani Abdullah AlDubais

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She loves it and is very happy with the gift. I like it but wasn't crazy about the fact that she asked for it to cover up a new TATTOO! (but that's no reflection on the watch - just on college kids).
customer_reviews.author: S. Cerone

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch, Wasn't for my mom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my mom. She's about 50 years old and it just wasn't her style. Looked good, she just wanted a smaller dial.
customer_reviews.author: Patel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is the third watch I own from this brand. I haven't open the box yet. I ordered it for my self as christmas gift and I can't wait to open it on christmas day. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch, bought it for myself after looking at many rose two-toned watches of many different brands. But once I saw this one in person I fell in love. It is the trendy "large style" but still looks very nice and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Martinez

product_meta.title: Marc by Marc Jacobs Women's MBM3194 Amy Two-Tone Stainless Steel Watch with Link Bracelet
product_meta.description:
The Amy Bracelet Watch features a polished rose-gold-plated stainless steel etched logo top ring combined with a brushed and polished two-tone stainless steel bracelet and a tri-fold buckle with spring-lock closure.

Length adjusts by having links removed.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.91 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 4.96 Ounces
 * Item model number :MBM3194
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 3, 2012
 * Manufacturer :Fossil Watches
 * ASIN :B0094A4KM6

 * .zg_hrsr_item {list-style : none};

    *  #10656 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:3.7 out of 5 stars37 ratings The Amy Bracelet Watch features a polished rose-gold-plated stainless steel etched logo top ring combined with a brushed and polished two-tone stainless steel bracelet and a tri-fold buckle with spring-lock closure.

Length adjusts by having links removed.
feature_bullets: Two-tone watch featuring logo-engraved rose gold-tone bezel and silver-tone dial with Arabic numeral and crystal hour markers
36 mm stainless steel case with mineral dial window
Stainless steel band with deployant clasp closure
Water resistant to 50 m (165 ft): In general, suitable for short periods of recreational swimming, but not diving or snorkeling
